collection.body:
GiftRocket

I designed the identity, web app and marketing website for San Francisco based startup, GiftRocket. GiftRocket is an app that reinvents the idea of the gift voucher. Buy a gift voucher for a friend, for anything you can think off.

View Website

collection.title: GiftRocket
